vista.graph
Interface CurveDataModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
InstValCurveModel, InstValFlaggedCurveModel, LineDataModel, PerValCurveModel, PerValFlaggedCurveModel, ProfileDataModel
public interface CurveDataModel

An interface containing the data required for drawing a Curve.

Version:
$Id: CurveDataModel.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:52 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

nextPoint

gets the next point

Parameters:

Returns:
